welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.greeting: Hi, I'm Paul. And you've landed on my personal website.
welcome.story1: As a child, I dreamed of becoming a writer.
welcome.story1Text: This desire inspired me to program a literature portal – a place where my friends and I could share our ideas and thoughts during school time. This dream became a journey: 20 years in the tech industry, in which I worked in almost every conceivable role around technology. Now my childhood dream has come true: In January 2025, my first novel, Riaru, was published.
welcome.story2: Today I live at the intersection of technology, leadership and creativity.
welcome.story2Text: As CTO at Vention, I help companies implement successful technology projects. In my podcast, I share my knowledge about tech products and leadership. I also accompany teams and companies as a mentor and consultant to find orientation in the digital world.
welcome.story3: This website reflects all facets of my work and passion. Whether you want to pre-order my book, are looking for inspiring podcast episodes, or are looking for a sparring partner for your digital challenges – I look forward to your message and your feedback.
welcome.ctaText: Follow me on LinkedIn or Instagram, or write me a message – I look forward to hearing from you.

introduction.title: Welcome to the most modern company in the world
introduction.paragraph1: Riaru is the most globally successful company: an online multiplayer game that allows its users to dive into foreign worlds, realize themselves and even profitably market their own business. Making the world a better place for everyone is Riaru's declared goal.
introduction.paragraph2: Mic desperately wants to contribute to this idealistic idea. But even an excellent degree in software development is meaningless when acquired in a small Argentine town. The career leap to Europe seems hopeless. But then Tuuli, the founder of Riaru, notices Mic. The job at the Berlin headquarters is like a dream. Until Mic wakes up.
introduction.paragraph3: Paul K. Lunow, himself a founder and programmer, provides deep insights into the structure of tech corporations and the handling of metadata in this exciting cyber novel. With his extensive background knowledge, he makes us understand what complex digital processes happen in the systems behind our monitors.

testimonials.title: Nice words from my environment...
testimonials.description: I am so happy about the many wonderful people from all over the world that I was able to work with and still do. Here are some quotes, slightly shortened and anonymized. I thank you all!

allTestimonials.content: Paul is top-notch professionally, but even more remarkable is his unpretentious, de-escalating, and always solution-oriented manner.
Your inputs in the peer leader group are ALWAYS valuable, the discussions are always great!
I can rely on your decisions, leadership and you are clear&transparent in your communication.
Thank you again for your impulse. It was really very well done – we were able to take a lot from it.
Stay so honest in the presentations about what doesn't work either – that went down very well!
Man I swear I like you so much and thank you for getting back to me, this means a lot for me
We still talk about you often and are very grateful for everything you built for us. Without you we would never have come this far. Come visit us again soon!
Every team can be super happy to have you and your nice, curious energy on board.
I keep noticing how much I enjoy working with you. Pragmatic, fast, on equal footing.
I find your ideas very exciting, a bit unconventional and very inspiring and future-oriented.
With what calm and ease you ask the questions. And really good questions - that's an art.

Building a new team consisting of externals and internals from multiple teams is rather challenging. He managed to bring all of us together around the same goal, which I find very impressive in such a short time.
It's great to have someone like you with entrepreneurial spirit and real drive for our customers AND our environment AND our teams on board!
